features.imageText: Add, replace, delete devices. Upload many device keys from files. Add metadata. Control gateways and servers

features.description: Be sure that your network is constantly up an running
features.dropdown: SenseSec constantly checks all parts in your infrastructure. If something happens you will get an alert and, if possible, be guided to solve the problem. If you have a system for handling alerts and alarms already, alarms can be sent fron SenseSec to that system

features.description: Be assured security is constantly high
features.dropdown: Manage security features. Update security keys. Keep track of different devices capabilities regarding safety.

features.description: Keep track of all parts in the infrastructure and their history
features.dropdown: Keep track of your device and its history. That could be locations, service or known problems for that device.
Integrate to your existing systems. E. g. user administration and access rights, systems for life cycle management of current equipment and SCADA systems.
If you have IoT networks built on different technologies (E.g. Wifi and LoRa) in your organization you can control them all from SenseSec
